metadata.title: CVE-2019-14289 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.01.01. There is an integer overflow in the function JBIG2Bitmap::combine at JBIG2Stream.cc for the "multiple bytes per line" case.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-14289` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
libpoppler-cpp0v5 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
libpoppler111 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
poppler-utils - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
No subscription required

notes.note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 ebarretto> since 0.5.12-1 libextractor does not use xpdf anymore. mdeslaur> in poppler, this is CVE-2017-9776

criterions.comment: ipe package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
poppler package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.76.1-0ubuntu4').
xpdf package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
